ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of BEVERLEY A. BUSSON of Blind Bay, British Columbia, to the position of Special Advisor to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, as member of the RCMP Reform Implementation Council, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, effective March 19, 2009.
